descriptionHtml:
Concentrated Poison Perk now has 5 levels
Rank 1 R40 Alch - 5 hits with 1 poison
Rank 2 R50 Alch - 10 hits with 1 poison
Rank 3 R60 Alch - 15 hits with 1 poison
Rank 4 R70 Alch - 20 hits with 1 poison
Rank 4 R100 Alch - 50 hits with 1 poison

you can now find the russian verion of this mod here
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12903

For a nice pack of poisons to go with this mod look here
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10868
Tactless Toxins is made by Magicfork, and i highly reccomend his work
author: Trippdoll
